channel.title: The Daily Star – Opinion
channel.description: Latest opinion pieces from The Daily Star

item.title: Persistent violence threatens our democratic transition
item.description: In the early hours of December 19, horrific attacks were carried out on Prothom Alo and The Daily Star, and later on two cultural organisations, Chhayanaut and Udichi, along with Nalonda School.

item.title: Tarique Rahman’s return and the weight of expectation
item.description: BNP acting chairman Tarique Rahman’s return to Bangladesh marks a new chapter in his political life—a new innings that also reflects a broader transition towards second-generation leadership in national politics.

item.title: Election is not the real story, what counts is how it is conducted
item.description: By now, we all know that February 12 is election day, and BNP acting chairman Tarique Rahman’s return after 17 years in exile has added December 25 as another date to remember.
